text:
Bethany:
“What a beautiful day to get some fresh air!”
“Yeah (huff puff)! That was a great way to learn (huff) about (puff) the wildlife here! Thankyou Bethany!”

Ben:
 Shhh...
Something’s here.”
“Ba-Ba-Boom! We’re ready to zoom!
Bottle Squad with a boom we are ready to zoom
Bottle Squad!
Bottle Squad!  Bottle Squad ! Be strong Be brave, Be smart, Be kind
Solving problems we don’t mind!
We are the closest friends you’ll ever find.
Bottle Squad
Ba Ba Bottle Squad

Becca:
“This little guy was all tangled up in the bush."
Becca: "poor thing!”

Babies:
“Aww!”

Ben:
“H-Hey little guy! It’s okay! We’re here to help you!”

Bethany:
“He must have lost his mommy!

Ben:
“I see three foot prints heading over the hill over there! I don’t know which ones are the mommy bears!”

Bethany:
“Let me help!

Bethany:
The ones leading to the bush are squirrel tracks!

Bethany:
"The ones leading into the cave are fox tracks!"

Bethany:
“The ones that lead over the hill are DEFINITELY bear tracks!"

Bethany:
“Great idea, Bozzie! We don’t want him to get in danger! Can I trust you guys to keep him safe?”
“Ba Ba boom. We’re ready to zoom”

Bethany 
“Don’t you worry. We will get you out of here in no time”

Bethany:
“Blake! We aren’t heavy enough to outweigh that bear! Use your super strength to get the biggest rock you can find!

Blake:
“I’m on it!”

Bethany:
"Almost there"

Bethany:
"Gently"

Bethany:
"Perfect"

Ben:
“Gently walk away from us towards the other side. We have your back”

Ben:
“I-it’s nothing Ma’am. I’m glad we could help!”

Bethany:
“I guess she’s thanking you, Ben!”

Ben:
“Wow! Now that’s what I call a BEAR hug!”
“If you need our help! You can count on us! That’s our Ba-Ba-Promise to you!”
